gif.body: let cmds = content.split("\"").slice( 1 ); console.log( cmds ); if ( cmds.length != 2 ) return; giphy.search( 'gifs', {"q": cmds[0].split(" ") } ).then( (response) => { let num = 1; let cmdNum = parseInt( cmds[1] ); if( cmdNum > 0 && cmdNum <= 10 ) num = cmdNum; let gifs = response.data.slice( 0, num ); message.reply( `Fetching ${num} gifs of ${ cmds[0] }`  ); gifs.forEach( ( gif ) => { message.channel.send( { files: [ gif.images.fixed_height.url ] }).catch( (err) => { message.channel.send( "Error fetching Gifs\nError: " + err ); })  }); }).then( () => console.log( "done") );
gif.description: Fetch gifs from Giphy: $gif "Your Gif Query" <num_of_gifs>
